section.title: "Deployable Units" View
section.para: In this view, it is possible to view, search, install and uninstall Deployable Units in the SLEE. A list showing the deployable units, identified by their filename, is displayed.

textobject.para: The Deployable Units Main View, showing the currently deployed units and action link to uninstall them.

section.title: View Deployable Units Details
section.para: It is possible to see detailed information about the deployable units by clicking on its name.

textobject.para: The Deployable Units Details View, showing the details of the DU.

section.para:
The following fields are shown:
Name
The Deployable Unit name, extracted from its filename.
ID
The SLEE identifier for this Deployable Unit.
Date
The deployment date for this Deployable Unit.
URL
The URL where this deployable unit was deployed from.
Components
The SLEE components included and deployed with this deployable unit.

section.title: Search Deployable Units
section.para: In order to find specific deployable units, use the Search tab, where it is possible to specify a string to search for and click the Search button to list the DUs for which the name matches the given string.

textobject.para: The Deployable Units Search View, showing a field used to search for specific named deployable units.

important.title: Regular Expression not supported in Deployable Unit Search
important.para: When searching for deployable units, it is not possible to use regular expressions. For example, using "diam*" will not produce results, while "diameter" will.

section.title: Install Deployable Units
section.para: A deployable unit can be installed to SLEE by going to the Install tab, clicking the Choose File button, browsing to the desired deployable unit file and clicking the Install button.

textobject.para: The Deployable Units Install View, showing a field used to enter/browse for deployable unit location.

important.title: Deployable Unit Installation
important.para: After installing a Deployable Unit, you will need to activate additional services (create Resource Adaptor Entities and Links, etc) as needed as these are not part of the installation process.

section.title: Uninstall Deployable Units
section.para: A deployable unit can be uninstalled from SLEE in the list view (both in Browse or Search tabs) by clicking the uninstall link.

important.title: Deployable Unit Uninstall
important.para: Please note that the deployable unit will be uninstalled, only if there are no components depending on it, no Links or Entities in the case of Resource Adaptors and services, they must be deactivated.
